Field Detail

$_matrixcodeNamespace

protected string $_matrixcodeNamespace = 'Zend_Matrixcode'

Namespace of the matrixcode for autoloading

$_type

protected string $_type = null

Matrixcode type

$_module_size

protected array $_module_size = array(1,1)

Size (in units) of a single matrixcode module (the 'black dots')

$_calculated_width

protected int $_calculated_width

Calculated width of the code

$_calculated_height

protected int $_calculated_height

Calculated height of the code

$_fr_color

protected int $_fr_color = 0x000000

Symbol color (fore color)

$_bg_color

protected integer $_bg_color

Background color of the code (transparent if empty)

$_with_border

protected bool $_with_border = false

Activate/deactivate border of the image

$_padding

protected array $_padding = array(1,1,1,1)

Spacing between code and image borders. A value of '1' means a padding equal to the size of one module.

$_text

protected string $_text = null

Text to encode

$_matrix_table

protected array $_matrix_table = null

Array containing the modules (2 dimensional array representing the 2 dimensional code)
